thunderstorm.description: Known for its perpetual, intense thunderstorms with constant heavy rain and violent storms.

drizzle.description: The swampy, mist-laden planet often has a drizzly and damp atmosphere, fitting the constant light rain.

rain.description: A water planet that experiences frequent, heavy rainfall.

snow.description: The icy planet covered in ice and snow year-round, making it the perfect match for snowy conditions.

mist.description: The forest moon often features misty conditions with dense forests and a cool, humid atmosphere.

smoke.description: A volcanic planet with rivers of lava and a smoky, ash-filled atmosphere due to constant volcanic activity.

haze.description: The city-planet often has a hazy atmosphere due to pollution and dense urban activity, creating a perpetual smog.

fog.description: Though primarily known for its clouds, the lower levels of Cloud City can be quite foggy, with thick, low-lying clouds creating fog-like conditions.

clear_hot.description: The desert planet with twin suns is known for its scorching heat and clear skies.

clear_warm.description: This rocky, arid planet has clear skies and hot temperatures, though not as extreme as Tatooine.

clear_temperate.description: Known for its beautiful landscapes and pleasant, temperate climate with clear skies.

clear_cool.description: This now-destroyed planet had a diverse climate, with clear, cool conditions in many regions.

clear_cold.description: A frigid planet, often with clear skies, known for its kyber crystal caves and cold temperatures.
